original_text:
For this is what Amos is saying:
“‘Jeroboam will die by the sword,
    and Israel will surely go into exile,
    away from their native land.’”
korean_text: 아모스가 말하기를 여로보암은 칼에 죽겠고 이스라엘은 반드시 사로잡혀 그 땅에서 떠나겠다 하나이다

sentences.original_text: For this is what Amos is saying:
Jeroboam will die by the sword,
and Israel will surely go into exile,
